Home » 40P21 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
54 Kilesadukādi, Sanidassanattika
Kilesadukādi, Sanidassanattika
120.
311Nokilesaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
312Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
